items.title: Implement AI Recommendation Engine
items.description: Develop and integrate an AI-based recommendation system to suggest products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update in real-time as user browsing behavior changes.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% relevance score in A/B testing.
non_functional: System handles up to 10,000 concurrent recommendation requests

notes: Assumed that the platform already has a product catalog and user tracking in place; requirement focuses on AI recommendation integration.
